name: Recipe: Five Pickled Treasures
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Five Pickled Treasures.

value.text: Purchase from Shimura Kanbei at Shimura's in Inazuma City

customize.name: Radish
customize.desc: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

customize.name: Carrot
customize.desc: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

customize.name: Lavender Melon
customize.desc: A brightly-colored fruit. The flesh within transforms into food with a unique mouthfeel when cooked.

customize.name: Seagrass
customize.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

customize.name: Five Pickled Treasures
customize.desc: Pickled vegetables. A round of fermentation makes food richer and also allows it to keep for longer. There were originally only four "treasures," but for auspiciousness' sake, the four vegetables were mixed and plated up with one additional "treasure" added in, hence the name "Five Pickled Treasures."
